entry.def: Bio- chemistry is the study of the chemical processes that happen in living things.
The biochemistry of a living thing is the chemical processes that happen in it or are involved in it.

means.word_mean: 1. the organic chemistry of compounds and processes occuring in organisms; the effort to understand biology within the context of chemistry
